title: 109_hr4224
content: Proportionate Final Benefit Act of 2005 - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to provide that: (1) an individual's entitlement to any OASDI benefit shall continue through the month of his or her death. And (2) the benefit shall be payable for such month only to the extent proportionate to the number of days in the month preceding the date of death.
